experience.description: I took care of computerizing the company trying to respond to all the daily needs of the employees. it was a great chance that allowed me to be able to deal with aspects of the IT world such as database administration, servers, network infrastructure on the two company offices. Search for suppliers, materials, creation of new network infrastructures (new asterisk telephone switchboard and related telephones, new cloud machine park). Convergence of all business technologies. I was able to propose solutions to make the work of all employees more efficient and halve IT costs.

During this experience I dealt with software development in the banking context. I ended my collaboration by leaving the company a Python script capable of replacing me in almost all my recurring activities.

During this work experience I worked as a team to give life to the new generation of the company's core business product in the field of physical and logical IT security. I ventured into the frontend development of a web app written in vue, obtaining good results about the UI and excellent results about the software design. I also had the opportunity to work on minor projects for important corporate clients such as A2A (I worked with SSIS, SSAS, SSRS, Necto technologies) and BNL (I worked with C # / .NET technologies).

I have developed an engine for the semantic recognition of telephone speech. The application should then have been integrated into the company's core business product with reference to the new generation customer care services. The excellent results obtained allowed me to verify my skills in the field of Deep Leaning (Python, Tensorflow) and Data Analysis.

education.study: Bachelor's degree in Electronics and Telecommunications Engineering
